infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs location access to provide safety alerts and emergency services based on your current location.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app needs location access to provide safety alerts and emergency services based on your current location.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app needs microphone access for voice commands and emergency communication features.
infoPlist.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: This app uses speech recognition to help you communicate with the AI assistant using voice commands.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs camera access to take photos for profile pictures and incident reporting.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs photo library access to select images for your profile and incident reports.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: This app needs contacts access to help you set up emergency contacts for safety features.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This app needs calendar access to help you plan safe travel itineraries.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: This app needs reminders access to set up safety check-ins and travel reminders.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Tourist Safety App to access your camera to take photos for profile pictures and incident reporting.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow Tourist Safety App to access your photo library to select images for your profile and incident reports.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow Tourist Safety App to save photos to your device for backup and sharing purposes.

plugins.contactsPermission: Allow Tourist Safety App to access your contacts to help set up emergency contacts for safety features.
